item.title: Mother-in-law of rape accused says he should be hanged
item.description: The youth's wife Archana Devi said if charge was true, her husband should be given stringent punishment.

item.title: AAP activists protest outside PM's residence
item.description: The activists were detained and taken to a nearby police station.

item.title: JandK drug scam: Health minister Sham Lal Sharma gets clean chit
item.description: Company had not only obtained order for supply of drugs worth Rs 11.35 lakh on basis of forged documents.

item.title: Be innovative to ensure India's rapid growth: Manmohan Singh to bureaucrats
item.description: Manmohan Singh asked bureaucrats to be innovative and enterprising in order to ensure country's growth.

item.title: Earthquake measuring 3.4 shakes Assam
item.description: An earthquake of mild intensity measuring 3.4 on the Richter scale shook Assam today, the third within a week to rock the state.

item.title: More TDP, Congress leaders set to join TRS, claims Chandrasekhar Rao
item.description: Close on the heels of a TDP MLA announcing his decision to join TRS, the TRS president K Chandrasekhar Rao today said many others from TDP and Congress would join his party soon.

item.title: Jharkhand: 19-year-old tribal woman gangraped by three persons
item.description: The 19-year-old married tribal woman had come to witness the Ramnavmi procession in Chatra.

item.title: BJP women activists protest outside Sonia Gandhi's residence
item.description: They broke the barricades near Gandhi's residence, but prevented from moving forward.

item.title: Man arrested for raping 6-yr-old girl in Aligarh
item.description: Accused was detained and his statement was recorded before magistrate: Police

item.title: Mentally ill, handicapped woman raped in Nagpur
item.description: A 40-year-old mentally unstable and physically challenged woman was allegedly raped in Nagpur.
